title: Roast loin and braised shoulder of salt marsh lamb with caper jus
ingredients: 2 litres/3½ pints veal stock (substitute chicken or beef stock if unavailable)
2kg/4½lb Desiree potatoes, peeled and finely sliced
salt and freshly ground black pepper
1 best end salt marsh lamb, approx 7 cutlets
salt and freshly ground black pepper
salt and freshly ground black pepper
